title: Shiro <1></1> Offline Signer
p-0-1: Make sure <1>{{recFile}}</1> is present, contains the Bitcoin secret phrases, and is protected with the correct PGP passphrase.
p-0-2: Copy the incomplete transaction code to the text area below (use USB flash drive, or WhatsApp web chat to yourself, etc.).
p-0-3: Disconnect this computer from the network.
p-0-4: Enter your PGP passphrase to unlock the file in the field below.
p-0-5: Click on the button to sign the transaction.
